name: Python Virtualenv
description: A feature to install create and configure a Python virtualenv.

venvLocation.description: The fully qualified location of the virtualenv to create. Will default to ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.venv file if not set.

requirementsFile.description: A fully-qualified path to a requirements.txt file inside the container which will be installed. Will default to ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/requirements.txt file if not set.

includeSetupTools.description: Whether to include setuptools in the virtualenv.
